labels.label: Name / Description
labels.communityToken: Does your community have a token?
labels.noResultsSubtitle: Try to modify your search to find the corresponding wallets.

whitelistWallets.addWalletsSubtitle: Add a wallet to your DAO

review.tokenHoldersWithTkns: Members with ≥ {{tokenAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} voting power or balance

labels.author: Author
labels.earlyExecutionDescription: Allows a proposal to be executed before the voting period ends if the support threshold is surpassed, the minimum participation is met, and the outcome cannot be changed by more voters participating.
labels.voteReplacementDescription: Allows voters to change their vote during the voting period. This setting can’t be enabled if early execution is enabled.
labels.name: Name
labels.minimumApprovalDescription: Participation is the number of addresses in the authorized list that approve a proposal. The minimum is how many have to approve it for the result to be valid.
labels.minimumApprovalAdditionalInfo: When new wallets gets added or removed to the Multisig DAO, you have to review the Minimum Approval.
labels.addWalletsDescription: Wallets can create proposals, propose to send funds in and out of the treasury, and vote in your DAO.

placeHolders.searchWalletAddress: Filter by ENS or wallet address …

emptyState.title: Make your first deposit
emptyState.description: Begin by making your first treasury deposit. Learn more about managing a DAO treasury {{link}}.

modalExport.headerDesc: Select the date range you would like to export

feedback.title: File saved!
feedback.desc: The CSV should now be saved on your device.

treasuryEmptyState.desc: To add funds to your DAO, make a deposit. Learn more about it {{link}}.
treasuryEmptyState.title: No tokens found

emptyState.title: Create your first proposal
emptyState.subtitle: What's the first thing your community needs to decide? For ideas on how to structure proposals, {{link}}.
emptyState.description: Get your community involved in the decision-making process. Learn more in our {{link}}.

executionCard.title: Actions
executionCard.description: These actions can be executed only once the governance parameters are met.

status.succeeded: Proposal has passed and is ready to be executed

statusMultisig.expiredDesc: This proposal action can no longer be executed because the expiration time has passed. If you want to reattempt executing this action, you must create a new proposal, pass it, and execute it within the expiration time.

executionCard.title: Actions
executionCard.desc: These actions can be executed by the execution multisig after the proposal passes a community vote.

infos.voteDuration: The minimum duration of {{days}} days is defined by DAO governance settings. To change the minimum duration a vote is required.
infos.voteDHDuration: The minimum duration of {{days}} days and {{hours}} hours is defined by DAO governance settings. To change the minimum duration a vote is required
infos.voteDHMDuration: The minimum duration of {{days}} days, {{hours}} hours, and {{minutes}} minutes is defined by DAO governance settings. To change the minimum duration a vote is required

newVotingTypes.description: We'll be adding more voting types in the future.
newVotingTypes.title: New votings types soon

errors.amountWithInvalidToken: Cannot validate amount with invalid token address
errors.exceedsFractionalParts: The number of decimals in the amount must not exceed the number of decimals of the token({{decimals}})
errors.includeExactAmount: The token doesn't contain decimals. Please enter the exact amount
errors.invalidImageType: Invalid file type. Please provide either a JPG, PNG or GIF
errors.imageDimensions: Please provide a squared image with size between {{minDimension}}px and {{maxDimension}}px on each side
errors.imageTooLarge: Please provide an image of max {{maxFileSize}}MB in size
errors.lteZero: The amount must be greater than zero
errors.ltAmount: The amount must be less than {{amount}}
errors.notERC20Token: Token address is not ERC20 compliant
errors.duplicateAddressOnCurrentMembersList: This wallet address is already a member of this Multisig.
errors.percentage: Percentage amount should be between 0 and 100
errors.totalSupplyZero: Total token supply can not be 0
errors.requiredTokenAddressZero: Required token amount can not be 0
errors.ensDuplication: ENS subdomain is already taken. Try a different name.
errors.ensNameInvalidFormat: Please only use Lowercase letters, numbers, and the dash '-'
errors.ensNameLength: DAO name must be less than 128 characters
errors.duplicateContractAddress: Smart contract has already been added
errors.biggerThanTotalSupply: Minimum tokens must be less than total supply

required.label: Label is mandatory
required.name: DAO name is mandatory
required.title: Title is required
required.minApproval: At least one authorized address is required in order to approve a proposal.

errors.startPast: Process must not start in the past

minimumApproval.required: Minimal approval has to be set.
minimumApproval.lessThanOne: Minimum approval can not be less than one address.
minimumApproval.exceedMaxThreshold: Minimum approval threshold cannot exceed total members.

tokenVoting.proposalMinDuration: {{days}} days, {{hours}} hours, and {{minutes}} minutes  is the lowest vote time.
tokenVoting.proposalMaxDuration: {{days}} days is the highest vote time. Consider lowering the duration, otherwise this proposal may never pass.
tokenVoting.acceptableProposalDuration: The minimum duration of {{days}} days, {{hours}} hours, and {{minutes}} minutes is defined by DAO governance settings
tokenVoting.dateTimeMinDuration: The proposal's end date cannot be less than {{days}} days, {{hours}} hours, and {{minutes}} minutes in the future. Corrected to minimum duration set on the DAO settings.

multisig.proposalMinDuration: One hour is the minimum expiration time.
multisig.proposalMaxDuration: To keep your DAO secure, it's not recommended to have an expiration time longer than 2 weeks.
multisig.accepTableProposalDuration: It’s recommended to have an expiration time of five days, so you have a clean proposal list.
multisig.dateTimeMinDuration: Duration cannot be less than one hour.

alert.durationAlert: Set this to a duration that is long enough for your members to have sufficient time to vote. It’s recommended to set this to at least 1 day.
alert.minDurationAlert: The minimum duration is one hour.
alert.startDateInPastAlert: Start time can’t be in the past.

wrongNetwork.title: Wrong network
wrongNetwork.description: The action can't be executed because you are in the wrong network. Change to the <1>{{network}}</1> on your wallet and try again.

gatingUsers.tokenDescription: You don’t have the required voting power or token balance. Creating proposals in {{daoName}} requires at least {{amount}} ‘{{tokenSymbol}}’ in either voting power or token balance.
gatingUsers.walletDescription: You are not a member. Creating proposals in {{daoName}} can only be done by addresses that have been added to its member list.

alert.tokenBasedMembers: The DAO members listed here have interacted with the DAO at least once

warnings.amountGtDaoToken: Withdraw amount is greater than the current token balance

TransferModal.item2Subtitle: Create a proposal to withdraw assets to a wallet.

TokenModal.tokenNotAvailableSubtitle: Check your wallet, update the tokens or add a custom token to transfer
TokenModal.tokenNotAvailableSubtitleDao: Update the tokens or add a custom token to transfer.

TransactionModal.approveSubtitle: To sign your first transaction, you must approve Aragon App in your wallet.
TransactionModal.gasEstimationErrorLabel: Failed to estimate gas fee. You can still proceed.
TransactionModal.publishDaoSubtitle: The fees below are the cost of using the selected blockchain.

AddActionModal.title: Add action
AddActionModal.addAddressesSubtitle: Create a proposal to authorize new wallets to vote in your DAO.
AddActionModal.removeAddressesSubtitle: Create a proposal to unauthorize wallets from voting in your DAO.
AddActionModal.mintTokensSubtitle: Mint more DAO tokens and distribute to wallets.
AddActionModal.withdrawAssetsSubtitle: Create a proposal to withdraw assets to a wallet.
AddActionModal.withdrawAssetsActionSubtitle: Withdraw assets from the DAO treasury
AddActionModal.externalContractSubtitle: Interact with an external contract on the chain your DAO is deployed on.
AddActionModal.changeMinimumApprovalSubtitle: Modify minimum approval of this DAO.

withdrawAddresses.subtitle: Create a proposal to withdraw assets to a wallet.

AddActionModal.connectdAppsSubtitle: Interact with verified dApps via WalletConnect.

newDeposit.configureDepositSubtitle: A proposal is not needed to deposit assets into the treasury
newDeposit.reviewTransferSubtitle: After confirming, you can't edit or reverse the transaction.
newDeposit.toSubtitle: The recipient is automatically set to your DAO address.
newDeposit.contractAddressSubtitle: You have selected a custom token. Enter the contract address of this token to interact with it.
newDeposit.amountSubtitle: Amount is calculated in number of tokens, not dollar value
newDeposit.referenceSubtitle: Add a description so you can easily identify the transaction later.

configureWithdraw.title: Initiate withdrawal
configureWithdraw.subtitle: To withdraw assets from the treasury, your proposal will need to pass a vote.
configureWithdraw.toSubtitle: The wallet that receives the tokens
configureWithdraw.amountSubtitle: Amount is calculated in number of tokens, not dollar value

setupVoting.title: Initiate the vote
setupVoting.description: Set the choices, start date, and end date for your vote.

yesNoLabel.title: Yes, no, or abstain
yesNoLabel.helpText: Members can vote for, against, or abstain.

tokenVoting.endDateDescription: Define how long the voting should last in days, or add an exact date and time for it to conclude.

votingOption.label: Approve
votingOption.description: Each multisig member has the ability to approve the proposal and any associated optional actions. The proposal will be executed if {{amountMembers}} out of {{totalAmountMembers}} members approve it.
votingOption.alert: Approval is the only option for Multisig DAOs.

multisig.startDescription: Define when a proposal should be active to receive approvals. If now is selected, the proposal is immediately active after publishing.
multisig.expirationDescription: Define when a proposal should expire. After the expiration time, there is no way to approve or execute the proposal.

defineProposal.heading: Create a proposal
defineProposal.description: Provide the information voters will need to make their decision here.
defineProposal.title: Title
defineProposal.summaryPlaceholder: Describe your proposal in 2-3 sentences. This will appear in the proposal overview.
defineProposal.proposalPlaceholder: Write the body of the proposal here.

reviewProposal.heading: Review proposal
reviewProposal.description: Check to make sure everything is correct before putting it to vote. You can't edit a proposal once it's published.

daoAddress.alertCritical: You can't withdraw money to your own DAO treasury.

overview.title: Build your DAO
overview.description: Start simple and learn as you go. You can always evolve your DAO in the future.

step1.label: Step 1
step1.title: Select blockchain
step1.description: The chain you choose is where your tokens and assets are stored. If you already have a token, choose the chain your token is minted on. This cannot be changed later. For help selecting your chain, read our guide on choosing the best {{link}}.

step2.label: Step 2
step2.title: Describe your DAO
step2.description: Name and define your DAO so new contributors know they've come to the right place. This information is displayed on the DAO Explore page and can be changed with a vote. For ideas on DAO branding, {{link}}.
step2.logoSubtitle: JPG, PNG or GIF of no more than 3MB. We recommend 1024x1024px.
step2.descriptionSubtitle: Describe your DAO's purpose in a few sentences. This is listed on the Explore page so new contributors can find you.
step2.linksSubtitle: Links to your DAO's website, social media profiles, Discord, or other places your community gathers.
step2.ensNameSubtitle: This will be your DAO’s unique ENS subdomain, created automatically for you. Lowercase letters, numbers, and the dash '-' are all acceptable characters; ideally, the character count should be under 128.

step3.label: Step 3
step3.title: Define membership
step3.description: Decide the type of voting your DAO uses. You can change these settings with a vote. For help deciding which type of governance is best for you, {{link}}.
step3.authorisedWalletsSubtitle: Add wallets of members who are authorized to participate in governance
step3.warningSubtitle: If you want to add addresses after creating your DAO, you will need to create a proposal to be voted by the members.
step3.newTokenSubtitle: No, I would like to create a token.

existingToken.title: Import your existing token
existingToken.description: Import the existing ERC-20 token that your community uses for governance. We recommend to read about why this is important in {{link}}.
existingToken.questionLabel: Does your community already have an ERC-20 token to govern your DAO?
existingToken.inputDescription: Enter the contract address. We recommend pasting it directly from a block explorer.
existingToken.verificationAlertSuccessDescription: This token can be used to participate in your DAO's governance because it follows the ERC20Votes extension to the ERC-20 standard.
existingToken.verificationAlertWarningDescription:
This token must be wrapped by its holders to participate in your DAO's governance.

Token holders can wrap their tokens within the Aragon App at any time to receive equivalent governance tokens (1 {{tokenSymbol}} = 1 {{gTokenSymbol}}). These can then be used to vote on proposals in your DAO. They can unwrap at any time to receive their original tokens.
existingToken.verificationAlertCriticalDescription: This token is not supported in the Aragon App. Try a different token or specify that you don't have a governance token yet.
existingToken.verificationAlertCriticalBlockchainDescr: This token is deployed on a different blockchain than the one you chose for your DAO. Use a token deployed on {{blockchainName}}.

step3.existingTokenSubtitle: Yes, we already have a token.
step3.multisigMembershipSubtitle: Only multisig members can vote. 1 wallet address equals 1 approval.
step3.multisigMembersHelptext: There is no limit on the number of addresses on your multisig. Addresses can create proposals, create and approve transactions, and suggest changes to the DAO settings after creation.
step3.multisigMembersWalletAlert: Your connected wallet was automatically added to the list. You can remove it if you like.
step3.multisigEligibilitySubtitle: Specify who is permitted to create proposals.
step3.multisigEligibilityAlert: With anyone being able to propose, there is a risk of proposal spam. Consider only authorized addresses.
step3.tokenMembershipSubtitle: Tokens act as voting chips. The more tokens you hold, the more weight your vote has. 1 token equals 1 vote.
step3.walletMemberShipSubtitle: Allowlist wallet addresses of trusted members, so voting is 1 wallet = 1 vote. Allowlisted wallets can also create proposals.
step3.nameSubtitle: The full name of the token. Example: Uniswap
step3.symbolSubtitle: The abbreviation of the token. Example: UNI
step3.addExistingTokenHelptext: We don't currently support existing tokens in Aragon App.
step3.tokenContractSubtitlePart1: Copy the contract address directly from the
step3.tokenContractSubtitlePart2: This way you can ensure that the address is correct.
step3.distributeTokensHelpertext: Add the wallets you'd like to distribute tokens to. If you need help distributing tokens, {{link}}.
step3.proposalCreationHelpertext: Specify who is permitted to create proposals and what the minimum requirement is.
step3.distributionWalletAlertText: Your connected wallet was automatically added to the distribution list. You can remove it if you like.
step3.whiteListWalletAlertText: Your connected wallet was automatically added to the list. You can remove it if you like.
step3.createTokenHelptext: Define the token details and distribute tokens to a core team and DAO treasury. For more on token minting best practices, {{link}}

anyWallet.title: Any wallet
anyWallet.description: Any connected wallet can create proposals.

multisigMembers.description: Only the addresses added above can create proposals.
multisigMembers.title: Multisig members

tokenHolders.description: Only token holders with at least the minimum required balance or delegates minimum required voting power can create proposals.
tokenHolders.title: Members

anyone.warning: With anyone being able to propose, there is a risk of proposal spam. Consider having a minimum token threshold.

step3.membershipSubtitle: You can always start with a multisig and mint tokens later.

blockChainVoting.label: On what blockchain will community voting take place?
blockChainVoting.optionOnchainDesc: Voting on proposals will require your community members to sign transactions and pay {{blockchainName}} gas fees. Proposals that pass a community vote can be executed by anyone.
blockChainVoting.optionGaslessDesc: Vote on proposals without paying gas fees. Proposals that pass must be then approved by the DAO's Execution Multisig before being executed.

step4.label: Step 4
step4.title: Select governance settings
step4.description: These are the rules that define how decisions are made in your DAO. How many people have to participate? How much support is needed? How long are proposals open for voting? Learn more in {{link}}.
step4.supportThresholdSubtitle: The percentage of tokens that vote "Yes" in support of a proposal, out of all tokens that have voted, must be greater than this value for the proposal to pass.
step4.minimumParticipationSubtitle: The percentage of tokens that participate in a proposal, out of the total {{gTokenSymbol}} supply, must be greater than or equal to this value for the proposal to pass.
step4.supportSubtitle: Support is the relative percentage of tokens or wallets that are required to vote “Yes” for a proposal to be approved.
step4.durationSubtitle: The shortest period of time a proposal is open for voting. Proposals can be created with a longer duration, but not shorter.
step4.minimumApprovalSubtitle: Minimum approval is the amount of addresses in the authorized list that must approve a proposal for it to pass.

alerts.minimumParticipationAlert: Rounded up to {{percentage}}% equals {{walletCount}} wallets have to vote
alerts.minority: Proposals could be approved by a minority rather than a majority.
alerts.majority: Proposal will be approved by majority
alerts.absoluteMajority: This approval threshold might be too high to reach regularly. Consider setting something lower.
alerts.1AddressOnly: The approval threshold can’t be changed because there is only 1 address.

step4.wrappedReferenceDesc: The amount of {{gTokenSymbol}} that must vote to meet minimum participation depends on the amount of {{tokenSymbol}} that is wrapped. The values on this screen with an asterisk are for reference only. You can evaluate different scenarios by adjusting the following value. Learn more about {{link}}.
step4.wrappedReferenceAlertInfo: These values are for reference only and do not affect your "governance settings"!

review.title: Deploy your DAO
review.description: Double-check that everything is correct before deploying your DAO.
review.daoUpdates: Most of these settings can be changed later with a vote.
review.proposalCreation: Members with ≥ {{token}} {{symbol}} voting power or balance

deployDAO.title: Deploy your DAO
deployDAO.description: The only cost to deploy your DAO are the {{networkName}} network's gas fee. Confirm the transaction to deploy your DAO and we'll start assembling it right away.

alertCritical.dontClosePage: Don't close this page while in progress.

deployDAO.POAPtitle: You are now an Aragon DAO Builder!

configureActions.heading: Set actions
configureActions.description: These actions can be executed only once the governance parameters are met.
configureActions.addFirstActionSubtitle: This action will execute if the vote passes. A common automatic action is transferring funds to a guild or person if their proposal passes a vote.
configureActions.actionsInfo: More options for parameters are coming soon.

actionAlertCritical.title: Time-sensitive action
actionAlertCritical.desc: This action must be executed within a specified duration. Even if the proposal passes, it may be too late to successfully execute.

configureActions.addFirstActionDesc: Add your very first optional action if you wish to perform on-chain executions
configureActions.alertInfo: Based on the voting options setup, it is only possible to add actions to the option "Yes".

actionAlertWarning.title: Action not decoded
actionAlertWarning.desc: This action can't be decoded because the smart contract is not verified.

mintTokens.methodDescription: Create a proposal to mint more governance tokens. Select the wallets that should receive tokens and determine how many.
mintTokens.additionalInfo: The total token supply includes all tokens you've already minted.

manageWallets.title: Add or remove wallets
manageWallets.description: Authorized wallets can create proposals, propose to move funds in and out of the treasury, and vote in your DAO

configureActionsEncoded.inputDataDesc: Encoded EVM call data for the smart contract

votingTerminal.title: Voting
votingTerminal.yesHelptext: Your choice will be counted for "Yes"
votingTerminal.abstainHelptext: Your choice will be counted for "Abstain"
votingTerminal.noHelptext: Your choice will be counted for "No"

multisig.endDescription: Proposal is active until approved or it expires
multisig.title: Multisig approval
multisig.description: Minimum approval must be reached before actions can be executed.

votingTerminal.chooseOptionHelptext: To vote, you must select one of the following options and confirm in your wallet. Once the transaction is completed, your vote will be counted and displayed.

status.ineligibleWhitelist: You had to be a member before the proposal was created to be able to vote
status.ineligibleTokenBased: You had to hold {{token}} when proposal was created to be able to vote

emptyState.title: No voters yet
emptyState.subtitle: Search for another wallet address or ENS

approveAndExecute.infoAlert: Only one more approval is needed in order to execute the proposal actions.
approveAndExecute.infoAlertApproved: No more approvals are needed in order to execute the proposal actions.

vocdoni.title: Voting
vocdoni.desc: The proposal must first pass a community vote and then be approved by the execution multisig.
vocdoni.alertInfoActionsApproval: These actions must be approved before execution.

hero.title: Explore the DAO World
hero.subtitle1: Build your DAO, explore communities, and find inspiration for your project all in one place.

emptyStateProposal.title: There are no active proposals
emptyStateProposal.description: You can still check upcoming or past proposals in your DAOs.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.analyticsHelpText: Collects information on how you use the App.
privacyPolicy.functionalHelpText: Used to store your preferences in the application.
privacyPolicy.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, enable certain features, and analyze our application usage. You may opt-out of cookies here. Learn more in our {{link}}.

cookiePreferences.title: Cookie Preferences
cookiePreferences.content: To access this feature, we need to store your preferences. Enable cookies to continue.

create.title: Create your DAO
create.description: Mint tokens, set governance parameters, and deploy your DAO on-chain in minutes with our no-code setup process.

learn.title: Learn about DAOs
learn.description: Find inspiration and learn about DAOs in our education portal designed for builders at every stage of the journey.

build.title: Build faster
build.description: Use our governance plugins to build a DAO, dApp, or anything you can imagine on the Aragon OSx protocol.

404.titleLine2: you found a wormhole in the DAO space!

settings.proposeSettingsSubtitle: Confirm the new settings that will be included in your proposal.
settings.editSubtitle: To edit settings such as the logo and description, you'll need to create a proposal and put it to vote in your DAO.
settings.proposeSettingsInfo: To make changes to the settings, create a proposal and put it to vote in your DAO.

emptyState.title: We're building your DAO!
emptyState.subtitle: The on-chain data is being deployed and published. This won't take very long.

deposit.headerDescription: Send assets to the DAO treasury
deposit.inputHelptextEns: Copy the ENS or address below and use your wallet's send feature to send money to your DAO's treasury.
deposit.inputHelptextBlockchain: Use the appropriate blockchain. Funds cannot be restored once they have been sent.

exitProcess.description: If you leave the process, you'll lose all the information you've put in. Would you like to exit the process?

mintTokensToTreasury.title: Minting tokens to the DAO treasury
mintTokensToTreasury.description: The DAO cannot cast votes. Beware of minting too many tokens to your DAO treasury, because you may not be able to reach minimum participation and thus will be unable to execute any proposal actions.
mintTokensToTreasury.alertDescription: Instead of minting tokens to your DAO treasury, consider minting them to a member's wallet address so the tokens can be used for voting.
mintTokensToTreasury.inputHelptext: To confirm, fill in the DAO contract address below.

wrapToken.desc: Wrap {{tokenSymbol}} to get {{gTokenSymbol}}, which is used to participate in governance. You can unwrap {{gTokenSymbol}} at any time (1 {{tokenSymbol}} = 1 {{gTokenSymbol}}).
wrapToken.inputModeLabel: What do you want to do with your tokens?
wrapToken.inputAmountDesc: Define amount to wrap to get your governance-compatible {{tokenSymbol}}.
wrapToken.footerDesc: To wrap this {{tokenSymbol}}, you must first approve the amount to be usable by Aragon App.
wrapToken.footerAlertCriticalApprove: Error while approving your tokens. Try again.
wrapToken.footerAlertCriticalWrap: Error while wrapping your tokens. Try again.
wrapToken.successDesc: You have received {{amount}}  {{gTokenSymbol}} in your wallet. You are now a member of the DAO and can use these tokens to participate in governance.
wrapToken.label: Join the DAO

unwrapToken.successDesc: You have received {{amount}} {{tokenSymbol}} in your wallet.

delegationActive.label: Delegation
delegationActive.title: You have no voting power
delegationActive.desc: You are delegating your voting power of {{balance}} {{tokenSymbol}} to {{walletAddressDelegation}}. If you want to participate in future proposals, you have to claim your voting power.

delegation.label: Delegation
delegation.optionsLabel: What do you want to do with your delegation?
delegation.codeInputDesc: Enter a wallet address to delegate your votes to.

alertCard.title: How does delegation work?
alertCard.desc: Delegating increases the voting power of this address by your current or future {{tokenSymbol}} balance. If you are delegating to someone else, you will be unable to vote until you claim your voting power.

delegation.successDelegateDesc: You have delegated all your voting power of {{balance}} {{tokenSymbol}} to {{delegateEns}}. You have the option to revoke this at any time.
delegation.successReclaimDesc: You have claimed your voting power of {{balance}} {{tokenSymbol}}. Your voting power will be available in future proposals, but not for those that are already active.

NoVotingPower.desc: You were delegating your voting power of {{balance}} {{tokenSymbol}} when this proposal was created.
NoVotingPower.title: You have no voting power

CantVote.title: You can't vote
CantVote.sentence1a: You weren't holding {{tokenSymbol}} and had no voting power when this proposal was created.
CantVote.sentence1b: You held {{balance}} {{tokenSymbol}} but had no voting power when this proposal was created .
CantVote.sentence2b: If you want to participate in future proposals you have to claim your voting power.
CantVote.sentence2c: If you want to participate in future proposals you have to obtain {{tokenSymbol}}.

delegationInactive.title: You have no voting power
delegationInactive.desc: You haven't delegated your voting power of {{balance}} {{tokenSymbol}} to any address. If you want to participate in future proposals, you have to claim your voting power for yourself or delegate to another address.

multisig.ApproveExecuteDescription: The cost to approve the proposal and execute its actions will be the gas fee for a single transaction.
multisig.approveDescription: Review your vote before submitting and check the respective gas fees cost.
multisig.ApproveProposalDescription: The only cost to approve the proposal will be the gas fee.

dappConnect.title: Select dApp
dappConnect.desc: You can interact with the following dApps to add actions to your proposal. Learn more about {{link}}.

validation.codeInputHelp: To connect, open {{dappName}}, copy the WalletConnect QR code to your clipboard, and paste it here.
validation.alertCriticalDapp: The QR code provided is not from {{dappName}}.
validation.alertCriticalQRcode: The QR code provided is not from {{dappName}}.

detaildApp.desc: You can can interact with {{dappName}}. Actions you take will be added to this proposal.

dappConnect.headerDesc: You can interact with the following dApps to add actions to your proposal. Learn more about {{link}}.

addressValidation.title: Smart contract address
addressValidation.description: Enter the smart contract address. It's best to copy this address directly from

selectionEmptyState.title: Select smart contract
selectionEmptyState.description: Create your own action to attach to your proposal by selecting any smart contract on {{networkName}}.

validation.addressInputHelp: Enter the contract address. We recommend pasting it directly from a block explorer.

emptyState.title: No smart contract added
emptyState.description: Add a smart contract to interact with it. To learn more, read {{link}}.

abi.abiInputHelp: To generate actions for an unverified smart contract, add ABI functions. To learn how to add ABI functions, read {{link}}.

inputPayableAmount.description: Enter the required amount of {{tokenSymbol}} to be paid.
inputPayableAmount.label: Payable Amount

writeContractEmptyState.title: Write contract
writeContractEmptyState.desc: No public write actions were found.

inputWallet.ensAlertWarning: This network does not support ENS domains

mintToken.title: Another proposal is active
mintToken.description: Beware of another proposal that mints additional tokens. This implies that the token supply may not be the final one and that it may affect future votes.

emptyState.title: Become the first member
emptyState.desc: Wrap your {{tokenSymbol}} to become a member of the DAO community. This will enable you to participate in governance. Learn more about it {{link}}.

wrapToken.title: No governance tokens found
wrapToken.desc: Wrap your {{tokenSymbol}} to become a member of the DAO community. This will enable you to participate in governance. Learn more {{link}}.

tokenAmount.inputDesc: Select the token and the amount that you would like to withdraw

explore.desc: Build your DAO, explore communities, and find inspiration all in one place.
explore.title: Aragon App

governance.title: Governance of {daoName}
governance.desc: Participate in {{daoName}} by creating and voting on proposals.

finance.title: Finance of {daoName}
finance.desc: View all {{daoName}} financial transactions and funds.

alert.title: Aragon OSx updates are available.
alert.desc: New versions of Aragon smart contracts are available. Updating your DAO requires a proposal to be created and passed.

reviewUpdates.headerDesc: New features and security improvements are regularly released by the Aragon team. While updates aren't applied automatically, any community member can review the release notes below and propose an update.

itemList.alertInfo: To propose the selected updates, you will first have to prepare the above plugin.

modalVersion.title: Select version
modalVersion.desc: Multiple versions of the update are available. Review the release notes of each before making a selection

modalPreparePlugin.title: Prepare plugin
modalPreparePlugin.desc: Plugins must be prepared as a separate transaction before being proposed to the community.

proposal.title: Aragon OSx Update
proposal.summary: This proposal is an Aragon OSx Update for {{daoName}}. The title, summary, and description text are automatically generated by Aragon App.
proposal.descriptionFooter: It is essential to consider the implications of upgrades before voting. Read the above release notes and confirm that this OSx Update passes Aragon’s Security Verification.
proposal.descriptionHeader: This proposal contains on-chain transactions that would upgrade specific smart contract components as follows:
proposal.descriptionProtocolUpgrade:
• {{updatedVersion}}
    1. Current version: {{currentVersion}}
    2. Upgrade description: {{description}}
      1. View Release Notes
    3. Note: The DAO’s address will never change
proposal.descriptionPluginUpgrade:
• {{updatedVersion}}
    1. Current version: {{currentVersion}}
    2. Upgrade description: {{description}}
      1. View Release Notes

modalCritical.title: Are you sure you want to proceed?
modalCritical.desc: This proposal may put your DAO at risk. Learn more about Aragon OSx updates {{link}}.
modalCritical.alertDesc: One or more proposal actions aren't in the Aragon Update Registry, indicating that this update could be potentially harmful.
modalCritical.inputDesc: To confirm, fill in the DAO contract address below.

verification.title: Update verification
verification.desc: Aragon OSx updates should always be verified prior to being voted on or executed. The following checks are the most essential and are automatically performed for you by Aragon App. To learn more about Aragon OSx updates, {{link}}.

itemCriticalDecoding.desc: At least one action can’t be decoded, indicating that this update could be  harmful.

itemCriticalFailed.desc: One or more of our checks found that these actions are not constructed properly, indicating that this update is harmful.

AlertCritical.title: Action may fail
AlertCritical.desc: Even if the proposal passes, this action may fail if it is executed after {{date time}}

stepCommunityVoting.title: Community voting parameters
stepCommunityVoting.desc: Establish the conditions that determine the passage of a proposal during the community voting phase. How much support does the proposal need? How much of the community needs to participate? How long is the proposal open for voting? Learn more in {{link}}.

executionMultisig.title: Define your execution multisig
executionMultisig.desc: To bring the offchain results onchain, a execution multisig is needed to validate the results and perform the optional actions of a proposal. Learn more about the execution multisig and its tasks in {{link}}.
executionMultisig.membersDesc: These addresses form the governing body that approves and executes proposals passed by the community. Add the addresses who will be members of the execution multisig.
executionMultisig.executionDesc: Execution expiration time is the window available for the execution multisig to enact a passed community-backed proposal before it becomes ineligible for execution.

submitVote.title: Submit your vote
submitVote.desc: The only cost to publish your proposal are the {{votingBlockchain}} network's gas fee.
submitVote.alertDontClose: Don't close this page while in progress.

Desc.MemberNotSeeking: This member has not declared themselves to be seeking delegations in {{daoName}}.
Desc.OwnerNotSeeking: You have not declared yourself as seeking delegations in {{daoName}}.
Desc.MemberOwnsVPower: [PROV] This member owns his voting power of {{votingPowerValue}}{{tokenLabel}} for {{DAOname}}.
